main event: Numerous sightings of two orb-size objects resembling beach balls, stacked one on top of the other, observed in Santa Monica, California.
interesting points: The objects were silvery and shifted to a reddish color., They were observed behind buildings in the area., The observation lasted for several minutes., Witnesses included reliable military and civilian sources., Venus and Jupiter were noted in the comments as possible explanations for the sighting.
sighted object: Two stacked orb-size objects that shifted color from silver to reddish
witness description: Reliable military and civilian witnesses including a supervisor and several other residents.
